revised_title: Isolation and Analysis of Organo-Metallic Radicals: Mercuric, Plumbic, and Stannic Ethyl
tldr: The author investigates the isolation and properties of organo-metallic radicals, specifically mercuric, plumbic, and stannic ethyl, through chemical reactions and synthesis. The study provides insights into the composition and behavior of these compounds, contributing to the understanding of their chemical properties and potential applications.
